### IsNonIntegral {#ad846f2e4294b2b7abe1fa835f6890b47}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="bool llvm::DataLayout::PointerSpec::IsNonIntegral">
Pointers in this address space don&#39;t have a well-defined bitwise representation (e.g.

may be relocated by a copying garbage collector). Additionally, they may also be non-integral (i.e. containing additional metadata such as bounds information/permissions).

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/datalayout-h/#l00085">85</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/datalayout-h">DataLayout.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
